member.summary: A ProgressBar for Console

member.summary: Width of entire ProgressBar Default = 30

member.summary: Gets the internal Width of the ProgressBar

member.summary: Description of the ProgressBar

member.summary: Tag object

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.Maximum
member.summary: The Maximum value Default = 100

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.Value
member.summary: The current Value If Value is greater than Maximum, then updates Maximum value

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.Percentage
member.summary: Percentage of progress

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.HasProgress
member.summary: Indicates if the ProgressBar has Progress defined (Maximum defined)

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.Step
member.summary: The amount by which to increment the ProgressBar with each call to the PerformStep() method. Default = 1

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.ElementName
member.summary: The Name of the Curent Element

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.FixedInBottom
member.summary: True to Print the ProgressBar always in last Console Line False to Print the ProgressBar fixed in Console (Current position at Starting) You can Write at Console and ProgressBar will always be below your lines Default = true

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.Delay
member.summary: Delay for repaint and recalculate all ProgressBar Default = 75

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.IsStarted
member.summary: True if ProgressBar is Started

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.IsPaused
member.summary: True if ProgressBar is Paused

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.IsDone
member.summary: True if ProgresBar is Done: when disposing or Progress is finished

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.TimeProcessing
member.summary: Processing time (time paused excluded)

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.TimePerElement
member.summary: Processing time per element (median)

member.name: P:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.TimeRemaining
member.summary: Estimated time finish (to Value = Maximum)

member.name: F:ConsoleProgressBar.ProgressBar.ConsoleWriterLock
member.summary: A Lock for Writing to Console

member.summary: Converts a TimeSpan to String, showing all hours

member.summary: Converts a TimeSpan to String, showing all hours

member.name: M:ConsoleProgressBar.Extensions.StringExtensions.AdaptToConsole(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string that occupy all console line/s
member.param: The string to write in console

To allow print the string in muliple lines or only in one: True: The text can be represented in more than one Console line (fill spaces to the end of last line) False: The text must be represented in only ONE line (truncate to fit or fill spaces to the end of line)

member.name: M:ConsoleProgressBar.Extensions.StringExtensions.AdaptToMaxWidth(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string with exactly maxChars: Truncates string value or fill with spaces to fits exact length
member.param: Text appended when it is truncated. Default: "..."
